title: The Gambler Dostoevsky
brief_description:
Episode of Series “Risk”.
A play based on Dostoevsky’s novel “The Gambler”. Dostoevsky lived his life on the edge of disaster, financial, political and emotional, and the story is about his gambling and about his loving. Dostoevsky’s widow, Anna, recalls her relationship with this complicated man.
